successes.title: "All-American Boy" - The Album
successes.description: Keep the music/message pure. Be my "label" and help fund and promote my first record, "All-American Boy" - The Album.

Pledges.description: BE A PART OF THE DREAM. Let's show the world that a good love song is a good love song--no matter who sings it or who s/he sings about. Help me keep my music and message real, so that all our voices can be heard, and get a personalized thank-you note from me.
GET THE RECORD. Get a digital download of the record we made together and a personalized thank you note from me.
FRAME ME. Get an autographed 8 x 10 color photo of me and a digital download (in May) of the record we made together.
GET THE RECORD IRL. Get a digital download (in May) of the record we made together and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.
I DRAW YOU WITH SMELLY MARKERS. Send me a face pic, and I'll mail you a custom magic marker portrait, created and signed by me. And get a digital download (in May) of the record we made together.

WEAR YOUR PRIDE ON YOUR SLEEVE. Get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

GO RETRO. Get an old-school vinyl LP copy of the album, a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a personalized thank-you note from me.

DECORATE. Get a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

GET CREDIT. Your name will appear in the album booklet--next to my Mom :) And get a  Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

GET ANSWERS. I'll send you a 30-second video thanking you for your contribution and answer one question you have for me--keep it PG ;) And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

I'LL "STAY" WITH YOU FOREVER. Get one of the props from the "STAY" music video, a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

GET "EXTRA" SPECIAL TREATMENT. Appear in one of my music videos as an extra and be part of the fun and craziness that ensues. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me. Costs for travel to shooting location paid by Backer.

TAKE THE CLOTHES OFF MY BACK. Get the sunglasses or one of the shirts worn by me in the "All-American Boy" or "STAY" music videos, a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

BE MY CO-STAR. Appear in one of my music videos with at least 12 seconds of screen time. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me. Costs for travel to shooting location paid by Backer.

BE MY INSPIRATION. Tell me about yourself, and I'll write a 30-second song about you and send you a video of me singing it and mail you the signed lyric sheet. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

GET AMPED. Get the Blue Dragonfly microphone and Robbie pre-amp I used to record "All-American Boy. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me.

TAKE THE STAGE. Get VIP treatment at my album release party in Chicago in May. You will be called on stage and recognized as a major donor (unless you are afraid of crowds). After the show, I'll treat you to dinner. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me. Costs for travel to Chicago paid by Backer.

BE MY "ALL-AMERICAN BOY" TONIGHT. Meet me for dinner in Chicago or while I'm on tour! I will play songs from my new record on my acoustic guitar, and I'll drink whiskey from the infamous, bottomless flask from the "All-American Boy" music video. (You will have to bring your own whiskey, because alcohol cannot be offered as a reward on Kickstarter!) And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me. Costs for travel to Steve's location paid by Backer.

LET ME SERENADE YOU. I'll perform a private acoustic set for you and your friends (within the US only), including three cover songs of your choice and some of my originals. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me. All costs to bring Steve to Backer's location are included.

LET ME SERENADE YOU IN 2015. I'll perform a private acoustic set for you and your friends (within the US only), including three cover songs of your choice and some of my originals. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me. All costs to bring Steve to Backer's location are included. THIS REWARD CAN BE REDEEMED IN 2015 ONLY.

THE DIE-HARD. Come to all three of my album release parties--New York, Los Angeles and Chicago--all in one week! You will be called on stage and recognized as a major donor at each event (unless you are afraid of crowds). After each show, I'll treat you to dinner. And get a Steve Grand exclusive t-shirt (new design), a limited-edition, "All-American Boy" lyrics poster, a digital download (in May) of the record we made together, and a CD copy (in June) of the record with a personalized thank-you note from me. AIR TRAVEL (for 2), HOTELS (4 nights) AND GROUND TRANSPORTATION INCLUDED.
